jdrasil.utilities

Class RandomNumberGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdrasil.utilities.RandomNumberGenerator

  • public class RandomNumberGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Static overlay of Javas random number generator, as we globally need a single random sequence, that can be seeded with a single seed. This should be the only source of randomness used by classes and methods of Jdrasil.

    • Constructor Summary
